verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י׀ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah year הַשִּׁשִּׁ֗ית <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shit, And it came to pass in the sixth בַּשִּׁשִּׁי֙ <S%H8345><s%> bash-shish-Shi in the sixth בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> ba-cha-mish-Shah [month] in the fifth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh, [day] of the month אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev [as] I sat בְּבֵיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-Ti, in mine house וְזִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> ve-zik-Nei and the elders יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah יוֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vim sat לְפָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai; before וַתִּפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> vat-tip-Pol fell עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai on שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, there יַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> yad me that the hand אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai of the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. GOD

וָאֶרְאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh, Then I beheld וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold דְמוּת֙ <S%H1823><s%> de-Mut and lo a likeness כְּמַרְאֵה־ <S%H4758><s%> ke-mar-'eh- as the appearance אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh, of fire מִמַּרְאֵ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> mi-mar-'Eh from the appearance מָתְנָ֛יו <S%H4975><s%> ma-te-Nav of his loins וּלְמַ֖טָּה <S%H4295><s%> u-le-Mat-tah even downward אֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh; fire וּמִמָּתְנָ֣יו <S%H4975><s%> u-mi-ma-te-Nav and from his loins וּלְמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> u-le-Ma'-lah, even upward כְּמַרְאֵה־ <S%H4758><s%> ke-mar-'eh- as the appearance זֹ֖הַר <S%H2096><s%> Zo-har of brightness כְּעֵ֥ין <S%H5869><s%> ke-'Ein as the colour הַחַשְׁמַֽלָה׃ <S%H2830><s%> ha-chash-Ma-lah. of amber

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach And he put forth תַּבְנִ֣ית <S%H8403><s%> tav-Nit the form יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> Yad, of an hand וַיִּקָּחֵ֖נִי <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-ka-Che-ni and took בְּצִיצִ֣ת <S%H6734><s%> be-tzi-Tzit me by a lock רֹאשִׁ֑י <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi; of mine head וַתִּשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> vat-tis-Sa lifted me up אֹתִ֣י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti ר֣וּחַ׀ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach and the spirit בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> bein- between הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz between the earth וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between הַשָּׁמַ֡יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim and the heaven וַתָּבֵא֩ <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Ve and brought אֹתִ֨י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti יְרוּשָׁלְַ֜מָה <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Le-mah to Jerusalem בְּמַרְא֣וֹת <S%H4759><s%> be-mar-'ot me in the visions אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פֶּ֜תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach to the door שַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate הַפְּנִימִית֙ <S%H6442><s%> hap-pe-ni-Mit of the inner הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> hap-po-Neh that looketh צָפ֔וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah, toward the north אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it מוֹשַׁ֔ב <S%H4186><s%> mo-Shav, where [was] the seat סֵ֖מֶל <S%H5566><s%> Se-mel of the image הַקִּנְאָ֥ה <S%H7068><s%> hak-kin-'Ah of jealousy הַמַּקְנֶֽה׃ <S%H7069><s%> ham-mak-Neh. which provoketh to jealousy

וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-Hin-neh- and behold שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, there כְּב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod And behold the glory אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel כַּמַּרְאֶ֕ה <S%H4758><s%> kam-mar-'Eh [was] there according to the vision אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti that I saw בַּבִּקְעָֽה׃ <S%H1237><s%> bab-bik-'Ah. in the plain

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- he unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man שָׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> sa- lift up נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na now עֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha thine eyes דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech now the way צָפ֑וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah; toward the north וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> va-'es-Sa So I lifted up עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai mine eyes דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech the way צָפ֔וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah, toward the north וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold מִצָּפוֹן֙ <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tza-fOn and behold northward לְשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> le-Sha-'ar at the gate הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach, of the altar סֵ֛מֶל <S%H5566><s%> Se-mel this image הַקִּנְאָ֥ה <S%H7068><s%> hak-kin-'Ah of jealousy הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this בַּבִּאָֽה׃ <S%H872><s%> bab-bi-'Ah. in the entry

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer He said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- furthermore unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man הֲרֹאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> ha-ro-'Eh seest אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you; מֵהֵם me-hem כמָ֣ה Mah ק; הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem like קעֹשִׂ֑ים <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim; thou what they do תּוֹעֵב֨וֹת <S%H8441><s%> to-'e-Vot abominations גְּדֹל֜וֹת <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lot ;[even] the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- that the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל׀ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עֹשִׂ֣ים <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim committeth פֹּ֗ה <S%H6311><s%> Poh, here לְרָֽחֳקָה֙ <S%H7368><s%> le-ro-cho-Kah here that I should go far off מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al and מִקְדָּשִׁ֔י <S%H4720><s%> mik-da-Shi, chapel וְעוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> ve-'Od again תָּשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> ta-Shuv still תִּרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh, thee yet again [and] thou shalt see תּוֹעֵב֖וֹת <S%H8441><s%> to-'e-Vot abominations גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lot. greater ס sa-Mek

וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve And he brought אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach me to the door הֶֽחָצֵ֑ר <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer; of the court וָאֶרְאֶ֕ה <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh and when I looked וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold חֹר־ <S%H2356><s%> chor- hole אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad behold a בַּקִּֽיר׃ <S%H7023><s%> bak-Kir. in the wall

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- he unto me Son אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man חֲתָר־ <S%H2864><s%> cha-tor- dig נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na now בַקִּ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> vak-Kir; now in the wall וָאֶחְתֹּ֣ר <S%H2864><s%> va-'ech-Tor and when I had digged בַּקִּ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> bak-Kir, in the wall וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach door אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. behold a

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to me בֹּ֤א <S%H935><s%> bo unto me Go in וּרְאֵה֙ <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'Eh and behold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַתּוֹעֵב֣וֹת <S%H8441><s%> hat-to-'e-Vot abominations הָרָע֔וֹת <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'ot, the wicked אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> hem they עֹשִׂ֖ים <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim that they do פֹּֽה׃ <S%H6311><s%> Poh. here

וָאָבוֹא֮ <S%H935><s%> va-'a-Vo So I went in וָֽאֶרְאֶה֒ <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh and saw וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol every תַּבְנִ֜ית <S%H8403><s%> tav-Nit and behold every form רֶ֤מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> Re-mes of creeping things וּבְהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> u-ve-he-Mah beasts שֶׁ֔קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> She-ketz, and abominable וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all גִּלּוּלֵ֖י <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-Lei and all the idols בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel מְחֻקֶּ֥ה <S%H2707><s%> me-chuk-Keh pourtrayed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַקִּ֖יר <S%H7023><s%> hak-Kir upon the wall סָבִ֥יב׀ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv round about סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. around

וְשִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> ve-shiv-'Im them seventy אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish men מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> miz-zik-Nei of the ancients בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- of the house יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'el of Israel וְיַאֲזַנְיָ֨הוּ <S%H2970><s%> ve-ya-'a-zan-Ya-hu Jaazaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son שָׁפָ֜ן <S%H8227><s%> sha-Fan of Shaphan עֹמֵ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med And there stood בְּתוֹכָם֙ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cham and in the midst עֹמְדִ֣ים <S%H5975><s%> 'o-me-Dim of them stood לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem, before וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish with every man מִקְטַרְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4730><s%> mik-tar-To his censer בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do; in his hand וַעֲתַ֥ר <S%H6282><s%> va-'a-Tar and a thick עֲנַֽן־ <S%H6051><s%> 'a-nan- cloud הַקְּטֹ֖רֶת <S%H7004><s%> hak-ke-To-ret of incense עֹלֶֽה׃ <S%H5927><s%> 'o-Leh. went up

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַי֮ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about הֲרָאִ֣יתָ <S%H7200><s%> ha-ra-'I-ta hast thou seen בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- he unto me Son אָדָם֒ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what זִקְנֵ֤י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei what the ancients בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- of the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עֹשִׂ֣ים <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim do בַּחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> ba-Cho-shech, in the dark אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man בְּחַדְרֵ֣י <S%H2315><s%> be-chad-Rei in the chambers מַשְׂכִּית֑וֹ <S%H4906><s%> mas-ki-To; of his carved כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֹמְרִ֗ים <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim, said אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein else יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God רֹאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> ro-'Eh seeth אֹתָ֔נוּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ta-nu, עָזַ֥ב <S%H5800><s%> 'a-Zav hath forsaken יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the earth

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer He said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to me ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od Yet תָּשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> ta-Shuv also unto me Turn תִּרְאֶ֛ה <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh thee yet again [and] thou shalt see תּוֹעֵב֥וֹת <S%H8441><s%> to-'e-Vot abominations גְּדֹל֖וֹת <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lot greater אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they עֹשִֽׂים׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim. that they do
